body.name: Metal Desk Lamp Touch Reading Lights Table Lamp Arc Desk Lamps for Bedroom, 3 Way Dimmable Bedside Lamp with USB Charging Ports, Reading Lamp for Study Room and Office (Pink-02)

features: 【 Powerful Charging Table Lamps】The touch lamp with AC outlets. It's an assistant for you and your family! AC ports will work regardless of whether the bedside lamps are on or off. Each table lamp has one AC port on the lamp base so that you could charge your mobile phone, tablet, kindle reader, laptop, and other electronic devices.

【HIGH-QUALITY METAL DESK LAMP】: The charming design showcases a tubular metal body and wood lamp base for an added industrialized touch. This industrial desk lamp is designed for a modern and elegant look.

【3 WAY DIMMABLE TOUCH LAMP】The cute desk lamp is easy and convenient to adjust the brightness stages (low, medium, high, off); Low light is great for steady sleep or nursing; Medium light is suitable for daily use and High light is bright enough for reading and working. Tapping the sturdy base to dim the brightness levels to meet your various demands at different times or occasions.

【180°Flexible Gooseneck】Flexible Gooseneck enables this reading light to be adjusted to any angle you like without any noise, and the lightweight design makes it highly portable. You can use the desk lamps to work, read or study anywhere even in bed. Simple, lightweight, and the perfect item for back-to-school season and dorm room essentials.

【EYE PROTECTION & ECO-FRIENDLY 】: Our desk lamp included a 9W led bulb in the package. Table Lamp Made of high quality, no flicker, no dazzle, no dark area help those who read and work hours a day to protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, ideal for reading, drawing, work, study. Best Gift for kids & bookworms. As an eco-friendly reading desk lamp, it consumes 80% less power than traditional incandescent lights so you can reduce your carbon footprint while also reducing your electricity bill.
body.description: Reading Lights for Books in Bed, Clamp Lamp for Bed Clip On Reading Light Features： Book Light for Reading in Bed at Night: The reading lamp is a comfortable light that can bring you a warm and comfortable feeling. Excellent lighting quality: Desk Lamp with Clamp Base and Adjustable Gooseneck, The 15-inch 360 flexible gooseneck light allows you to easily bend and set the ideal lighting direction and viewing angle. The reading lamp is made of high-quality Metal, with good heat dissipation and distortion resistance, uniform brightness, no flicker, no glare, and eye protection. It is very suitable for reading, painting, work, and study. The lighted clip is easy to clip on the workbench, desk, headboard or other objects. The sturdy clip with foam pad protects the surface of the furniture from scratches, and the base can be stably placed on your table. On/Off Switch Material: Metal + Ceramic lamp Base Cable: 68.9 Inch GooseNeck: 15 Inch Maximum width of clamp: 2 Inch More than 50000 Hours working life can be consistently applied to your daily life and work. Adopt eco-friendly aluminum heat-dissipating lampshade, low power consumption, no heat,and it consumes 80% less power than traditional incandescent lights. E26/E27 light source (Do not contain light bulb, It is recommended to use a mini light bulb).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, softly-lit clip on lamp, not LED, good task lighting
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a bright clip-on lamp that's not LED, this is a good one - and light bulb is included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamps works so well with my desk which has a shelf I the back. It has good lighting and I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice but not terribly stable
reviews.reviewText: I like the design, but I found it tips over easily. Maybe a slightly larger base would help. When using it as a reading light at bedtime, I also was surprised to find the first touch created a dim light which was nice, but then to turn it off, I had to cycle through a bright light. I have learned to shut my eyes to reduce the shock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Very Good Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I’m glad I chose this particular lamp. Every part is well-made. The clamp is strong and cushioned (nice touch - it won’t scratch whatever it’s attached to). The neck is sturdy and can be bent in any direction. I like that the switch is located on the back of the shade. It ships with a light bulb - a nice bonus. Lastly, the packaging is tiny, minimal and “no frills (this is a good thing).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This exceeded my expectations the clamp was far better than the last model I had and it took up far less space in my work area

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These lamps are functionally flawed. The wireless charging is extremely weak. I put my phone on at 10% and after six hours was only up to 25%. The button to turn the light on is a simple touch sensor right next to where you put your phone to wirelessly charge, making it extremely easy to accidentally turn the light on when trying to grab your phone in the middle of the night or in the morning when still dark. The light has three dimming options. However, you have to go up through all of them in order to turn the light off. So, if you have it on the dimmest setting and want to turn it off, you have to go through the two brighter options before the light turns off. Also the outlets, both the USB and the standard outlet, have a blue light inside of them, so when nothing is plugged in, and the lights are off, it emits a blue light. Not worth the money, even though they’re cheap. They do look nice, I just wish they were more functionally smart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's a lamp
reviews.reviewText: It works exactly as it should that that's all i need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good light
reviews.reviewText: It uses a regular light bulb bulb so it is easy to light up a desk.

reviews.reviewTitle: Does not hold its weight and clamp damaged the desk
reviews.reviewText: It does not stay in position. The weight of the lamp is too much for the weak gooseneck. The actual clamp has rough edge and could have more holding power. Trying to adjust it will rub on whatever you attach it too and will damage your furniture.Out of frustration (euphemism) I threw it in the trash the same day I received it. Very disappointed.
